value.name: On Anniversary Of George Floyd’s Death, Families Of Men Killed By Boston Police Demand Cases Be Reopened
value.description: The families of Usaama Rahim, Terrence Coleman, Burrel Ramsey-White, Ross Batista and Juston Root say they want new investigations of their deaths.

value.name: People in Boston rally for justice and police reform on the anniversary of George Floyd’s death
value.description: Crowds gathered at Franklin Park in Dorchester and marched from a Milton church to a playground in Mattapan Tuesday evening.
